a1: Portugal's team is not underrated. They lost to Uruguay in the Round of 16 at the 2018 World Cup. Cristiano Ronaldo was the only productive attacking player for the team.

a2: Andres Silva, Bruno Fernandes, Bernardo Silva

a3: I think that Christian is the best forward because of his ability to play and his strategy.

a4: Uruguay in the Round of 16 at the 2018 World Cup. Cristiano Ronaldo was the only productive attacking player for the team.
